successes.title: LightSail: A Revolutionary Solar Sailing Spacecraft
successes.description: Unlimited free energy from the sun will provide CubeSat propulsion and revolutionize access to space for low-cost citizen projects.

Pledges.description:
COME SAIL AWAY
Climb aboard our campaign to create a spacecraft that can sail to other planets and the stars.  Contribute a dollar to show your support and receive Mission email updates that will be available only to Kickstarter backers, and automatically have your name sent to space on board the LightSail spacecraft launching in 2016.

SPACE CITIZEN
Cast your vote for Citizen-Funded Space Exploration.  We'll send you a Digital Donor Badge to share on social media so you can let your friends know about your Place in Space, plus backers-only email updates on the LightSail Mission, and automatically have your name sent to space on board the LightSail spacecraft launching in 2016.

LIGHTSAIL STICK/PIN
okay, so it's not really a stick pin, but you’ll receive a combo of a LightSail Mission sticker and a LightSail Mission pin so you can show your support of LightSail on your car/backpack/locker/bag.  This is in addition to the Digital Donor Badge, backers-only email updates, and your name to space!

GET PATCHED-UP
Your support at this level rewards you with a custom-embroidered LightSail Mission patch, as well as the Digital Donor Badge, emailed backers-only Mission updates and your name to space.

GET PATCHED-UP + STICK & PIN
Another great combo pack.  Your support at the $25 level rewards you with a custom-embroidered LightSail Mission patch plus the sticker and pin, as well as the Digital Donor Badge, emailed backers-only Mission updates and your name to space.

LIGHTSAIL MUG
This mug is neat in every sense of the word–simple in design, pleasing in appearance and clever in style. It will hold 14 ounces of your favorite hot beverage and boasts a glossy blue interior with a matte black exterior, the better to showcase the LightSail logo imprinted on the side. The mug reward level includes the Digital Donor Badge, emailed backers-only Mission updates and your name to space.

CENTIMETER OF SAIL + MEMBERSHIP
Backers at this level will own one square centimeter of LightSail, and a certificate of ownership to go with it!  You will also receive a one-year membership to The Planetary Society (for new members only), which includes a subscription to the quarterly Planetary Report newsletter to keep you informed of The Planetary Society’s projects and accomplishments. Your membership accompanies the Digital Donor Badge, emailed backers-only Mission updates, and your name to space. And you also get a choice of either (a) the LightSail Mission sticker and pin combo, or (b) a LightSail Mission patch.

LIGHTSAIL MEDALLION
Ideal for collectors, this is a limited-edition LightSail medallion of solid pewter depicting the LightSail spacecraft on the obverse and The Planetary Society with the motto “Create  ◦  Advocate  ◦  Educate” on the reverse. Nestled in its presentation box, it is the ideal reward for Planetary Society backers and members, space enthusiasts and collectors. That’s in addition to:
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

LIGHTSAIL PAPERWEIGHT
This is not your grandad’s clunky old paperweight. This lovely piece is made of solid acrylic and portrays the LightSail in all her glory. It measures 4 x 6 inches, and is ¾ of an inch thick, so if your desk is as messy as ours, you can stand it up to display as you would a photo instead of using it to anchor your papers. That’s in addition to:
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

LIGHTSAIL PHONE CASE
Add style and protection to your personal communication device while showing your support for citizen science and space exploration. We’ll be able to fit the iPhone 4 through 6 Plus, as well as the Galaxy S3 through S5. That’s in addition to: 
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

SPACE COLLECTOR’S TRIFECTA
In keeping with the advice of our friends at Mission Control, we are offering a trio of coveted collectibles which includes the limited-edition LightSail medallion in solid pewter, the custom-embroidered LightSail patch and an enameled LightSail pin. That’s in addition to: 
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

LIGHTSHIRT
Backers at the $50 level will be provided with a limited-edition LightSail Mission t-shirt. That’s in addition to: 
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

PLANETARY SOCIETY T-SHIRT
Backers at the $50 level will be provided with our very popular "You Have a Place in Space" t-shirt. That’s in addition to: 
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

OFFICIAL MISSION HAT
Space travel is a heady experience, indeed, as LightSail itself might be able to tell you. Enjoy this attractive, limited-edition Official Mission hat, and keep the sun’s glare out of your eyes while you stay grounded here on earth. That’s in addition to: 
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

LIGHTSAIL HOODIE
Like the iconic, hoodie-sporting boxer Rocky Balboa, LightSail proved itself capable of taking hits (from cosmic rays) and making a come-back. What better way to celebrate than to wear your own LightSail hoodie? That’s in addition to: 
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

LIGHTSAIL BOTTLE
From our friends at Liberty Bottleworks, this made-in-America 24 oz. water bottle in Patriot blue. It's made of super-strong recycled 3003 aluminum coils in their zero-waste manufacturing facility. The a baked-on finish is BPA-free flexible good-grade coating, so it's as safe as it is beautiful. That’s in addition to: 
● Backers-only email updates 
● Digital Donor badge to share via social media 
● CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards (with either (a) the LightSail Mission sticker and pin combo, or (b) a LightSail Mission patch)
● Your name to space.

LIGHTSHIRT + STICK/PIN OR PATCH
Another great combo reward. Backers at the $55 level will be provided with a limited-edition LightSail Mission t-shirt plus their choice of the sticker + pin, or the patch. That’s in addition to: 
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

PLANETARY SOCIETY T-SHIRT & LOGO LAPEL PIN
Yet another great combo reward. Backers at the $55 level will be provided with our very popular "You Have a Place in Space" t-shirt plus the Planetary Society lapel pin. That’s in addition to: 
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

CHOP SHOP POSTER, JR.  
Our friends at Chop Shop have designed a limited-edition LightSail Mission poster. This awesome 3-color, hand-printed screen print is 20” x 36". The full-size poster is a rare item with only 350 in existence, 200 of which are available on Kickstarter (we just added 50 to the 150 we already made available).  Due to popularity, we've now arranged for a slightly smaller but otherwise identical "Jr." version. The poster is available to LightSail Mission backers at the $75 level, which you’ll receive as well as:
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

CHOP SHOP POSTER, JR.  
This is the same image as the awesome 3-color, hand-printed screen print by Chop Shop. Due to popularity, we've now arranged for a slightly smaller (17" x 22") but otherwise identical "Jr." version. The poster is available to LightSail Mission backers at the $75 level, which you’ll receive as well as:
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

STERLING PLANETARY SOCIETY LAPEL PIN
The iconic Planetary Society lapel pin, as worn by our CEO Bill Nye, is being produced in sterling silver especially for Kickstarter backers. That’s in addition to: 
● Backers-only email updates 
● Digital Donor badge to share via social media 
● CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards (with either (a) the LightSail Mission sticker and pin combo, or (b) a LightSail Mission patch)
● Your name to space.

CHOP SHOP POSTER, JR. + PATCH
This is the Chop Shop Poster, Jr., with the addition of the Chop Shop designed mission patch.  A great combo, we think!  This poster and patch is available to LightSail Mission backers at the $80 level, which you’ll receive as well as:
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

CHOP SHOP POSTER
Our friends at Chop Shop have designed a limited-edition LightSail Mission poster. This awesome 3-color, hand-printed screen print is 20” x 36". This is a rare item with only 350 in existence, 150 of which are available here.  The poster is available only to LightSail Mission backers at the $100 level, which you’ll receive as well as:
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL
ONLY 50 AVAILABLE – Limited Time Only!

The very first 50 people to back the LightSail Mission Kickstarter campaign will be rewarded with the limited edition LightSail Mission poster created for us by Chop Shop, but the first 50 will also be autographed by the LightSail Mission team—including folks like Doug Stetson, Rex Ridenoure, Riki Munakata, Stephanie Wong, Barbara Plante, Alex Diaz, Justin Foley and David Spencer. Early birds will also get:
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

LIGHTSAIL BOW-TIE!  
Bill is not just famous for being the Science Guy—he’s also legendary for his fabulous collection of bow-ties. He wears them well! Don’t miss out on this opportunity to grab your very own LightSail bow-tie. Choose from one of three CEO-selected designs—Orbital Blue, Planetary Blue and LightSail Black. That’s in addition to: 
● Backers-only email updates 
● Digital Donor badge to share via social media 
● CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards (with either (a) the LightSail Mission sticker and pin combo, or (b) a LightSail Mission patch)
● Your name to space.

LIGHTSAIL TUMBLERS + COASTERS
LightSail tumbled a bit as it coasted around in orbit, so what better glassware than tumblers? Go ahead and raise a toast to LightSail with this beautiful, on-the-rocks set.  This nicely crafted collection will hold 10 oz. of your favorite beverage and is individually deep-etched by hand. The tapered shape tops a square base, the better to sit on the square corked-back acrylic coasters portraying the metamorphosis of LightSail, from its initial CubeSat form to its final stage, with its booms extended and sail deployed. That’s in addition to: 
● Backers-only email updates 
● Digital Donor badge to share via social media 
● CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards (with either (a) the LightSail Mission sticker and pin combo, or (b) a LightSail Mission patch)
● Your name to space.

LIGHTSAIL IN SILVER
LightSail is just so beautiful, isn’t she? We couldn’t help ourselves. We just had to commission a LightSail necklace and earrings in (what else?) sterling silver. Choose one of these two priceless pieces when we send you our survey. Or get both by sailing on over to our Add-Ons page to make sure you have both. That’s in addition to: 
● Backers-only email updates 
● Digital Donor badge to share via social media 
● CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards (with either (a) the LightSail Mission sticker and pin combo, or (b) a LightSail Mission patch)
● Your name to space.

LIGHTSAIL IN SPACE – AUTOGRAPHED PHOTO
We were able to downlink a spectacular photograph of LightSail with her sails fully deployed in the bright rays of the sun. This is an opportunity to have a signature copy with the signatures of the engineers on the mission team presented in frame-ready matte board. That’s in addition to: 
● Backers-only email updates 
● Digital Donor badge to share via social media 
● CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards (with either (a) the LightSail Mission sticker and pin combo, or (b) a LightSail Mission patch)
● Your name to space.

LIGHTSAIL-GAZER
Reap an extra-special reward at $150 – a LightSail-gazing kit (equally great for stargazing!), which includes FireCel portable power technology from our friends at Celestron.  FireCel provides portable power for your cell phone, tablet, MP3 player and other USB rechargeable devices.  Additional features include a red LED flashlight to preserve night vision and electronic hand warmer to supply heat in chilly conditions.  The FireCel comes with a Planetary Society picnic blanket and tote bag, so you can watch the skies in comfort and get it all there in style.  On top of that, you gain: 
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

A SIGNATURE FOUNTAIN PEN
Our CEO may be a tech-head, but he’s old school when it comes to signing his name. Yes, he favors fountain pens, and he has penchant for the LAMY AL-Star in particular. We’re arranging for a LightSail-colored version to be engraved with the LightSail logo, and you can be sure he will have one in his pocket protector before you can say “Let’s change the world!”  That’s in addition to: 
● Backers-only email updates 
● Digital Donor badge to share via social media 
● CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards (with either (a) the LightSail Mission sticker and pin combo, or (b) a LightSail Mission patch)
● Your name to space.

LIGHTSAIL TOOL SET
Are you a Maker who likes to work with technical stuff like gadgets, robots, printers and other programmable devices hacked together? If so, cool tools are a great thing to have on-hand, and what would be more cool than having a tool set actually used to help build LightSail-B? We have a limited set of tool sets that are actually being used, and we are making them available here.., and we will even have our engineers and technicians sign them! LightSail won’t be finished until next December, and we will need the tools until then. So, you’ll have to be a little patient, but isn’t worth the wait? That’s in addition to: 
● Backers-only email updates 
● Digital Donor badge to share via social media 
● CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards (with either (a) the LightSail Mission sticker and pin combo, or (b) a LightSail Mission patch)
● Your name to space.

LIGHTSAIL-GAZER + PIN AND PATCH
Reap an extra-special reward at $160 – a LightSail-gazing kit (equally great for stargazing!), which includes FireCel portable power technology from our friends at Celestron.  FireCel provides portable power for your cell phone, tablet, MP3 player and other USB rechargeable devices.  Additional features include a red LED flashlight to preserve night vision and electronic hand warmer to supply heat in chilly conditions.  The FireCel comes with a Planetary Society picnic blanket and tote bag, so you can watch the skies in comfort and get it all there in style.
You will also get your choice of a pin (you choose either the LightSail mission pin or the Planetary Society lapel pin during the post-campaign survey) and the mission patch.

On top of that, you gain: 
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

LIGHTSAIL-GAZER + T-SHIRT
Reap an extra-special reward at $175. You will get a LightSail-gazing kit (equally great for stargazing!), which includes FireCel portable power technology from our friends at Celestron.  FireCel provides portable power for your cell phone, tablet, MP3 player and other USB rechargeable devices.  Additional features include a red LED flashlight to preserve night vision and electronic hand warmer to supply heat in chilly conditions.  The FireCel comes with a Planetary Society picnic blanket and tote bag, so you can watch the skies in comfort and get it all there in style.
You will also get your choice of a t-shirt (you choose either the LightSail t-shirt or the Planetary Society t-shirt during the post-campaign survey).

On top of that, you gain: 
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

LIGHTSAIL-GAZER + T-SHIRT, PIN & PATCH
A great reward at $185. You will get a LightSail-gazing kit (equally great for stargazing!), which includes FireCel portable power technology from our friends at Celestron.  FireCel provides portable power for your cell phone, tablet, MP3 player and other USB rechargeable devices.  Additional features include a red LED flashlight to preserve night vision and electronic hand warmer to supply heat in chilly conditions.  The FireCel comes with a Planetary Society picnic blanket and tote bag, so you can watch the skies in comfort and get it all there in style.
You will also get your choice of a t-shirt (you choose either the LightSail t-shirt or the Planetary Society t-shirt during the post-campaign survey).
You will also get your choice of a pin (you choose either the LightSail mission pin or the Planetary Society lapel pin during the post-campaign survey) and the mission patch.

On top of that, you gain: 
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.

LIGHTSAIL-GAZER DELUXE EDITION
Deluxe? You better believe it! Our LightSail-Gazing Kit has been big a hit, and so we’ve worked with our friends at Celestron to offer a deluxe kit with additional products to ensure that you are ready to get eyes-on LightSail during its 2016 voyage. You’ll still get the FireCel portable power technology from our friends at Celestron, and the Planetary Society picnic blanket and tote bag, so you can watch the skies in comfort and get it all there in style. To that we are adding Celestron’s COMETRON 12X70 astronomical binoculars, the stylish and functional Liberty LightSail water bottle (for cold or warm liquids, it’s equally valuable on warm or cold nights), a LightSail lens cloth adorned with an image of your astronomical viewing target to remind you of what you are looking for, and Celestron’s SkyPortal Mobile App so you can identify planets, stars and other satellites while on your evening stargazing excursion. On top of all of that, you still get: 
●	Backers-only email updates
●	Digital Donor badge to share via social media
●	CENTIMETER OF SAIL rewards
●	Your name to space.
